In 3.2.0 those classes are in ia-web-commons.jar.

Noah


On Tue, Jun 17, 2=
014 at 5:19 AM, Arin Patel Itha iarinpatel@...
[archive-crawler] <arc=
hive-crawler@yahoogroups.com> wrote:

>
>
>
> All,
>
> I had an experience =
of using Heritrix v 3.1.0. I used to process Arc files
> and load the HTML =
records into a Database.
>
> Nowadays, I am working on v 3.2.0 and Heritrix=
 is generating *warc*
> files.
>
> However, I could not figure out a way to=
 read the contents of WARC file
> and store its records into a Database bas=
ed on what I know how it works
> with v 3.1.0.
>
> I am unable to find the =
below classes in *heritrix-commons-3.2.0.jar*
>
>
>    1. WARCReaderFactory=

>    2. WARCReader
>    3. WARCHeader
>    4. etc..
>
>
> *Note:* The pack=
age structure *org.archive.io.* *of v 3.1.0 is totally
> different to v 3.2=
.0
>
> So can somebody please advise, how I can build a parser with the lat=
est
> Heritrix release and send me a sample program?
>
> Thanks,
> Ravi Ith=
a
>
>
>
>
>
>
> 
>

--001a11c2f43463848704fc129e89
